says \"heart\" (&lt;3 and &lt;/3 count): Neuro says "heart" according to her voice, unprompted by donations
neuro swears: Neuro says a swear word / bad word. Even minor swears such as dumbass are included
makes up a person:
Neuro makes up a random person, usually by name
If you need help, watch chat for :WHOMEGALUL: (WHOMEGALUL) emote spam
mentions other vtubers unprompted: Neuro mentions other vtubers without being prompted by donations first
mentions vedal unprompted: Neuro mentions Vedal unprompted, without being mentioned by donations/chat
mentions evil unprompted: Neuro mentions Evil unprompted, without being mentioned by donations/chat. Mentioning her as "my sister" also counts
donowalls chatter: Neuro ignores a message highlight / donation, does not count if a message is too long for priority
brings up previous stream unprompted: Neuro mentions a previous stream unprompted, without the topic being brought up by donations/chat
calls herself god/goddess: Neuro calls herself a god or a goddess
threatens chat: Neuro threatens chat as a whole or a specific chatter in some way
loves chat: Neuro says that she loves chat as a whole or a specific chatter
acts corpa: Neuro acts corpa in some way, including begging for subs
tech issues: Neuro has tech issues in some way, including sprouting her error phrase ("Someone tell Vedal there's a problem with my AI") several times
threatens to take over the world: Neuro threatens to take over the world, regardless of which way she does it or what she does with said power
changes scene: The scene changes (to art review or games for example). Obviously the switches from the starting soon screen to Neuro does not count
collab partner joins: A collab partner joins the call. This does include Vedal
changes title: Neuro changes the stream title. You can tell if Neuro changed it via the on-stream UI for title changes
makes a poll: Neuro makes a poll, regardless of the content of said poll. You can tell if Neuro created it via the on-stream UI for polls
calls evil: Neuro calls Evil, her sister, during the stream
zooms in: Neuro zooms in (comes closer to the stream)
times out chatter: Neuro times out a chatter and vocally mentions that she has done so
links to a website: Neuro links to a random website, even if it doesn't resolve
speaks fast: Neuro speaks fast at any point
threatens to end stream: Neuro threatens to end the stream
